title: Introduction to Programming
subtitle: Introduction to programming in the Python programming language for total beginners

chapters.title: What is Programming
chapters.desc: We'll explain what programming is, how computers works and we'll see what problems programming helps us to solve.

chapters.title: Languages and Tools
chapters.desc: We'll install the Python programming language and tools that we'll need to program on our own computer.

chapters.title: Numbers and Strings
chapters.desc: Now we start programming for real and we'll try our first commands in the Python programming language.

chapters.title: Variables
chapters.desc: We need variables to remember some values for later user.

chapters.title: Functions and Modules
chapters.desc: We'll learn how to use functions and import modules so we don't have to write everything from scratch.

chapters.title: Input and Output
chapters.desc: We use input and output to teach the program how to communicate with users.

chapters.title: Conditions
chapters.desc: In this chapter we teach our programs to decide and change their behaviour based on user's input.

chapters.title: Sequential values
chapters.desc: Thanks to sequences we can store multiple values inside a single variable.

chapters.title: Loops
chapters.desc: We will teach our programs to repeat a certain activity.

chapters.title: Dictionaries
chapters.desc: New data structure that allows us to better organizer more complex data.

chapters.title: Custom Functions
chapters.desc: We learn how to write custom functions and split our programs into smaller parts.

chapters.title: Tips
chapters.desc: Small but useful tips from Python that did not fit elsewhere.
